DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate superiority nateglinide placebo inadequately control type 2 diabetic patient pioglitazone treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Nateglinide : Double Blind Add-on Study With Pioglitazone Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus treatment pioglitazone Patients follow diet therapy and/or exercise therapy Type 1 diabetes mellitus
